Title: The First Sip
Description: Buy a drink and talk to regulars to find the Forge.

Title: Alley Sweep
Description: Clear 5 Scavengers from Shadow Row for the Guard.

Title: Triage Duty
Description: Treat 3 wounded citizens in the Hollow Pit square.

Title: Heart of Steel
Description: Gather 10 Iron Ore from the Whistling Woods for the Smith.

Title: Steam Leak
Description: Repair the main steam valve in the Bar's basement.

Title: The Quiet Mark
Description: Infiltrate the Guard Post and steal the Bribe Ledger.

Title: Void Echoes
Description: Survive a night at the Silent Chapel without losing your mind.

Title: The Big Score
Description: Steal the Overseer Key from the Noble District.

Title: High Society
Description: Attend the Gala and convince the Ruler to lower taxes.

Title: Truth Extractor
Description: Extract the location of the rebel camp from the prisoner.

Title: Toxic Harvest
Description: Gather 5 Toxic Sludge samples from the sewers.

Title: End of Tyrany
Description: Assassinate The Ruler and free the town.
